text: Penei Sewell (born October 9, 2000) is an American football player for the Detroit Lions of the National Football League (NFL). He plays the offensive tackle position. He played college football for the Oregon Ducks. Sewell did not play in his third year in 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic and entered for the 2021 NFL Draft, where he was selected seventh by the Lions. title: Penei Sewell
